word_mean: 勒颈，勒颈窒息：堵塞或掐脖子(扼杀)，由于气道闭塞而致呼吸停止
绞窄：由于压迫而使局部循环停止

...嵌顿如能及时解除。病变肠管可恢复正常，绞窄性疝绞窄性疝(strangulated hernia)肠管嵌顿如不及时解除。肠壁及其系膜受压情况不断加重.
...肠管嵌顿时肠系膜内动脉的搏动可扣及,嵌顿如能及时解除,病变肠管可恢复正常, 绞窄性疝绞窄性疝,strangulated hernia,肠管嵌顿如不及时解除,肠壁及其系膜受压情况不断加重,可使动脉血流减少,最后导致完全阻断,即为绞窄性.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin strangulatio(n-), from strangulare 'chole' (see strangulate)

entry.def: Strangulation is the act of killing someone by squeezing their throat tightly so that they cannot breathe.

example.ex: He is charged with the strangulation of two students.
example.tran: 他被指控勒死了两名学生。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of suffocating (someone) by constricting the windpipe;

sentences.sentence: "no evidence that the choking was done by the accused"

means.word_mean: 2. the condition of having respiration stopped by compression of the air passage
3. (pathology) constriction of a body part so as to cut off the flow of blood or other fluid;
